attributes.action: Deselect Meriden MP Dame Caroline Spellman
attributes.additional_details: Caroline, whilst voting to trigger Article 50, the fundamental basis of which was to Leave the EU with or without a Withdrawal Agreement (often referred to as ‘a Deal’) on 31 March 2019, she has consistently voted to remove ‘No Deal’ from hands of negotiators and HM Government. She has teamed with opposition MP’s to erode the stability of the Government, and trounced over the ability of the UK reaching a positive ‘Deal’ with the EU.
attributes.background: Dame Caroline Spellman MP has served the constituency of Meriden for years. She’s been positive in so many ways, until - that is - BREXIT.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
